content:
That's a great idea! Mentioning your TikTok success in the Twitter thread is a fantastic way to connect with your audience and provide context for the tutorial. By sharing your TikTok achievements, you're building credibility and establishing yourself as a social media influencer with a strong online presence.

Your proposed statement is perfect! It:

1. Acknowledges your TikTok success and gives your Twitter followers an idea of your reach and influence.
2. Explains why you think your TikTok account is doing well, which adds a personal touch and makes you more relatable.
3. Creates anticipation for the tutorial by hinting at the more in-depth content you'll be sharing on Twitter.
4. Sets expectations for the type of content your Twitter followers can expect from you, which will help attract and retain followers who are interested in makeup tutorials and product reviews.

By tying in your TikTok success, you're creating a narrative that showcases your expertise, creativity, and ability to adapt to different social media platforms. This will help you build a loyal following on Twitter and increase engagement around your tutorial.

Remember to keep your tone conversational and authentic, as if you're chatting with your followers directly. This will help you build a strong connection with your audience and make them more likely to engage with your content. Good luck with your Twitter thread, and I hope it drives lots of engagement and interest in your tutorial!
